subject: Re: [junit] Re: Help,what's wrong with my TDD practice in my daily life?
msgSnippet: ... If this is the only requirement, your final code was more complex then needed. A hardcoded return value already would have fulfilled that requirement.
messageBody:
hyysguyang wrote:
> In my opinion about the requirement,I think I should not reverse any
> other sentence but
> the 'TDD is a software devolopment technology',so I needn't write so
> many test but the test below
>
> @Test public void testReverse(){
> StringReverser sr=new StringReverser();
> String str = "Tdd is a software devolopment
> technology";
> Assert.assertEquals("technology devolopment software a is
> Tdd",sr.reverse(str));
> }
> after this I refactor to the final code described befoe.Maybe I make
> a large jump.

If this is the only requirement, your final code was more complex then
needed. A hardcoded return value already would have fulfilled that
requirement.

Cheers, Ilja
